properties.description: Detects when an encryption password is deleted in Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate unauthorized removal of critical components.
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 31800
| extend Hint = extract("Hint=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Hint"] = Hint,
   MessageDetails = Description,
   Severity = SeverityDescription
properties.name: Encryption Password Deleted
